title: Binomial Coefficients and Pascal's Triangle
contentHtml:
Pascal's triangle is a famous mathematical object that appears in many areas of mathematics, including probability theory.

In this card, we'll explore the properties of binomial coefficients, which are used to construct Pascal's triangle.

title: Binomial Coefficients and Pascal's Triangle
contentHtml:
Pascal's triangle is a famous example of how combinations work.

It's built by starting with '1' at the top, then each number is the sum of the two above it. This creates a pattern that can be used to find binomial coefficients.
